results.event: Power failure!! The lights go out mid-match, cancelling match and the remainder of the evening's card.
Wrestler with highest Technical Rating pulls a move never-before-seen, pinning opponent.
Both wrestlers go out of ring and take the match into various corners of the arena before both being disqualified. Each wrestler, however, earns +1 to their Heat.
OOPS!! Balloon and confetti drop malfunctions and drops during match. -1 Heat to both wrestlers.
Technical difficulties!! TV/PPV coverage goes dark â€¦ matches go on, but all wrestlers involved receive a -1 to their Heat.
Wrestlers butt heads and knock each other out cold. Both fail to make count for a double count-out.
Equipment failure!! Turnbuckle padding comes undone during match. Heel slams Face into exposed metal, Face is out 4 weeks with a facial injury.
Face distracted by presence of Heel Gang stationed around the ring. -2 Heat to Face.
Wrestler with higher Savvy Rating tricks opponent into move that disqualifies opponent.
One of wrestling's greats appears mid-match to take over refereeing duties. Both wrestlers receive a +1 to their Heat.
Although it seems like something strange is about to happen, nothing interrupts the match.
Commissioner stops the match, announces that the match is now a Contract Ladder Match for the right to have the next shot at the Championship.
Although it seems like something strange is about to happen, nothing interrupts the match.
Wrestler with higher Strength Rating piledrives and injures foe. Stronger wrestler pins, loser out 3 months.
Heel distracted by taunting from Face fans sitting in front rows. -2 Heat to Heel.
Although it seems like something strange is about to happen, nothing interrupts the match.
Riot!! Fans become riled when concession stands run out of beer, start pelting the ring with debris. Match and remainder of the card is cancelled for the wrestlers' safety.
Although it seems like something strange is about to happen, nothing interrupts the match.
Heel Heat enters ring and attempts to attack Face with object. However, object hits both Face and Heel, knocking them both out. Double count-out.
Equipment failure!! Top rope snaps loose during Heel catapault move, causing Heel to tumble out of the ring, injuring leg and missing 5 weeks.
Celebrity sitting ringside becomes upset with Heel's tactics, enters ring. Heel bodyslams celebrity and throws them from the ring. Continue match as normal.
OOPS!! Pyrotechnic display goes off during match, showering ring with sparks, injuring both wrestlers, who will miss 1 week's action.
Wrestler with greater number of Heat Points gets the crowd going. +5 Heat for that wrestler.
Conspiracy!! Heel conspires with Face to lose match, setting up future title bout for Face.
Ring collapses!!! Both wrestlers and referee are injured and out of action for 2 months. Remaining action on tonight's card is cancelled.
